metadata.title: Line P - Phytoplankton Productivity Data, 1999-present
metadata.description: Primary productivity data along Line P and Station P for Sept 1999,  and March and June 2000.  Chlorophyll, primary productivity, chlorophyll fluorescence, photosynthetically active radiation, and phytoplankton abundance and biomass were measured.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Assessing the variability of primary production along Line P, constructing models to predict parameters of phytoplankton population and biomass.

Supplemental Information: Risk Justification: Data not secured in regional data centre .
Risk of Loss: Medium
Impact Justification: Time series of less than 5 years.
Impact of Loss: Low
Recommended Action: Obtain access to data and bring to archives

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Private

Use constraints: Will be made accessible once the data are verified.

Distribution liability: [unknown]

Non-digital ordering: Hardcopy Original Exists: Y
Hardcopy Locations: Angelica Pena, Rm     IOS
Hardcopy Description: Data sheets and log books.
Hardcopy Volume: Several binders
Physical Sample Exists: Y
Physical Sample Locations: Angelica Pena Rm 1308 IOS
Physical Sample Description: Phytoplankton samples preserved in glutaraldehyde or Lugol`s in bottles or on slides.
Physical Sample Complications: Phytoplankton samples degrade with time, need to be kept dark. Slides are kept frozen, dark.
Fees: Ask Custodian
